translations: 湿润；润湿；给湿（moisten 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: How I wish I could become a clear spring moistening all fresh flowers for you!
sentences.translation: 我多么渴望成为一湾清泉，为你滋润朵朵鲜花的娇艳！

sentences.sentence: Everyday dap it in your face, experience the pleasure of refreshing and moistening.
sentences.translation: 每天轻拍于脸上，体会清新、滋润的快乐。

sentences.sentence: Of course, there will be times when we feel our tissues moistening and naturally drop deeper into a pose.
sentences.translation: 当然，这需要一些时间，让我们的组织变得柔软，并在一个体式中自然的深入。
